content.query:
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[signup]
(
    id varchar(40) NOT NULL,
    creation_date datetime2(7) NOT NULL,
    source varchar(12) NOT NULL,
    source_id varchar(40) NOT NULL,
    user_id varchar(40) NULL,
    organization_id varchar(40) NULL,
    plan_type int NULL,
    plan_name varchar(50) NULL,
    seats int NULL,
    storage int NULL,
    ts bigint NULL
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH (source_id),
    HEAP
)
